meanings.definition: Not governed or controlled by rules or regulations.
meanings.sent1: The wild forest was unruled, with no laws to follow.
meanings.sent2: The children enjoyed the unruled playtime in the park.
meanings.sent3: The unruled chaos of the party made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her unruled creativity knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The unruled waves crashed against the shore with untamed power.

meanings.definition: Not marked or ruled with lines for writing or drawing.
meanings.sent1: She preferred the unruled notebook for sketching freely.
meanings.sent2: The unruled paper allowed for more artistic expression.
meanings.sent3: The unruled margins gave the page a unique look.
meanings.sent4: His unruled canvas was a blank space waiting to be filled.
meanings.sent5: The unruled sketchbook was perfect for doodling without constraints.
